reviews: After a week of usage, following are my reviews :

reviews: This review is post 2 weeks of use.
Overall a good value for money earpods.
Pros:
Bass (pretty decent)
Battery backup (on 1 go, i use max for 1 hr.. so couldn't test the company claim of 5hrs in one charge. So once u put back in case, it automaticallycharge back to 100)
Fitting (perfect ear fit, stays on even during workouts, can put safely under helmet although not recommended while driving)
Touch (pause, play, change of track works good enough under the price tag)
Value for money ( got it ...
These are my first truly wireless earbuds and it's worth the money! After a heavy usage of 2 days, here is my verdict!
Pros-
•Matte finish and sturdy look give the case a premium feel.
•Great battery life. If you charge the case around 100% it will give a backup of around 2 days on heavy usage!
•Touch controls are sensitive and takes the input quickly.
•Once the device is paired with your phone it connects seamlessly when you put the buds back in the ear!
•Sound is decent at this price rang...
You get what you pay for. I liked it and would give it 3.5 star.
I am writing this review after using it for almost 2 month.
Go for it. Value for money product in this price range.
Not perfect, but has its own pros and cons.
You get almost the same sound output as that of the wired shennheizer CX180. However CX180 > Shots Ergo
I am not a Game enthusiast so no idea about voice latency on PUBG or any other such games.
Pros:
- Good sound output. Balanced Mids, trebal and Vocals. Use ...

Earbuds are good sound quality I can't say excellent but best and bass are just good and unique design fits comfortably creates some vaccum in ears good for workout. I will suggest you to listen 8D and 16D types of song which works really good... good touch of control... good battery... but sometimes both earbuds get disconnected sometimes u can restart them and problem resolved... I will recomend u this for short budget
This product was my first wireless Bluetooth headset and I am writing this review after using for a week.

The sound quality was good but I sometimes find the sound use to get disconnected for a second and then plays as normal, this  happens more often while listening songs and I sometimes feel it very uncomfortable because I need to go back to hear the missed part.
The call quality is very good there was no disconnection of sound during the calls.people on both sides were able to hear properl...
Excellent choice quality and bass line, ideal for gaming and movies... Microphones and touch sensors works perfectly fine
Connectivity issues galore.
Ones connected with a phone the earbuds take turns going  silent for a few moment. No particular order or pattern. Connection is not stable and continuous to both earbuds.
After loosing connection the left does not reconnect on it own and after the set time is over the left ear bud switches off.
When you switch it back on it doesn't connect automatically nor when you select the device on the phone.
The only way is to reset the device, remove it from the list of d...

Its good but sometimes it takes time to connect with phone so you have to reset it. But overall its a good product. Fit is snug. Loved it. Bass and sound are 4/5. Build quality us really good. This review is after a month of usage.
Received next day delivery of the Noise shots.

After a few days use they are going good and have an exceptional battery life. No problem with connectivity until now. There is a 0.5 seconds lag between the video and the audio but its also disclosed on the website hence it was pretty clear from the start.
Overall its a great product in the applicable price range.

This product noise shots ergo was my first wireless earbuds and i cannot believe it to be this amazing.The colour the quality and the sound all of it is just perfect and I love it.Overall the product is good the look and the delivery ane everything is very good.I would rate it 5 out of 5 .Very nice product.

What you expect from a TWS?
Good performance, low latency, decent calling, amazing bass.
Phillips is well known for its sound capabilities, was skeptical about the features mentioned, turns out it works like a charm without a glitch.
Used those cheap regular chinese Ptron, Redmi, etc but these are way ahead of them, though this is also Chini but a premium brand.

Clear voice calling, haven't dropped bluetooth connection even once, average base and sound is pretty clear. Lows and mids are pretty clear. It's not that loud but satisfactory loud. Battery backup is good too, they haven't drained once and I use daily for 6-8 hours.

reviews: I just got these in 2 days delivered to me so I would start my review from few important things:
1- Sound quality is excellent and beats are like crystal clear.
2- Volume level is a bit less than other headsets available in market but enough to take you on a musical journey while you travel or in a noisy environment.
3- Touch response is like 90% accurate because it sometimes it takes a few seconds to respond but overall thats a good accuracy as you will get used to it in a couple of hours.

Everything thing is just perfect about these pair of earbuds. Got the best sound in the range. A decent battery life. Looks super sleek and stylish. Built quality is good. Very handy in terms of size and grip. Comfortable because of its light weight.  The only con I found is that the touch controls lags a bit. It doesn't work at once sometimes not always. But works for sure and perfectly fine on the second touch. So not such a big issue. Overall the best earbuds for the price.!

The Buds themselves are very light in weight and well built,but the comfort levels in the ear could have been better.Apart from that slightest flaw I didn't find any major downside In this product.To be honest in this price range shouldn't have asked for better !! The case could have been a bit smaller in size The music sounds flawless !

1. Do not use EQ. U will get most natural sound. Otherwise sound gets muffled.

3. Brilliant treble.

5. Sturdy built cable.
Cons:

2. At maxed out volume everything gets muddy. Bass treble starts to break.

•Matte finish and sturdy look give the case a premium feel.

•Sound is decent at this price rang...

reviews: After a week of usage, following are my reviews :
1. The earbuds were received in good packing and it looks exactly as advertised.
2. Finish and design of the earbuds and the case is premium and the blinking lights on the ear is eye-catching.
3. Sound quality is comparable to the top brands in business such as Bose, Sony etc. Treble, bass and all mids are perfectly balanced.
4. No TWS comes with extremely good call quality. In quiet surroundings, there shouldn't be any problem but when noisy...

You can not expect more than this kind of earpod in this price range. It has good sound quality, notable bass,touch control, call clarity is absolutely clear in indoor condition although did not check in outdoor condition, a 2500 mah charging case which can be used as power bank also. You should not ask more than this in this price segment. I am satisfied.

Sound quality is good while playing music...videos are played quite good though...in terms of calling...voice clarity is good too.. only con is ..while playing pubg...voice is not heard to the other players inbetween ..it lags a lot..this is the only improvement wings has to do... otherwise battery backup is excellent...i would suggest to go for this brand...taken some pics..shows as it is shown on the advertisements ...4 out of 5 rating .... design is impeccable...loved it..i got it for 3800...

People gonna surely notice the unique earbuds and everything is premium about this. product_name: Motorola Escape 210 with Google Assistant Bluetooth Headset

reviews: These are not over the ear headphones, but are on ear phones. The ear pieces do not completely envelope your ear. If you do want over ear headphones within this price range, I suggest you go for the Motorola Escape 200. The 210 does have a slightly better sound compared to the 200, but the volume of the 210 seems lower. This is best suited to be used indoors without a lot of surrounding noise, unless you blast the music at high volumes.
All in all, it's a good product, but falsely advertised.
Bought this considering the stylish look that that they have and they fit my budget
But when received them I was very much surprised.🙂
I worried about the bass but they have superior bass as quoted on the package.
I was pleased with the battery life of about 10hrs and used it with tv as well the audio quality was simply 👌
I even took many calls via the inbuilt mic and none of the parties complained about the calls.
The AUX Cable is also supplied and even in the wired mode I could enjoy the ...

The build quality is excellent at this price point.
I have mostly used ear-phone & on-ear headphones so far. But I am really enjoying the over-ear experience by Escape 210.
The best part is that even when I have used it for 5-6 hours, I don't feel any pain or heaviness.

The Bluetooth connectivity is strong enough for about 5 meters.
The charging is quick and it lasts for about 9 hours.

This is a value for money product dear readers. Initially, I had doubts regarding how well it'd fit in my ears but after having used it for days now, I can vouch that these are really comfortable(for someone whose ears are just not made for TWS earpods).

If you're looking for a decent pair of earpods backed by a powerful brand, this is the one.

reviews: I just got these in 2 days delivered to me so I would start my review from few important things:
1- Sound quality is excellent and beats are like crystal clear.
2- Volume level is a bit less than other headsets available in market but enough to take you on a musical journey while you travel or in a noisy environment.
3- Touch response is like 90% accurate because it sometimes it takes a few seconds to respond but overall thats a good accuracy as you will get used to it in a couple of hours.

Everything thing is just perfect about these pair of earbuds. Got the best sound in the range. A decent battery life. Looks super sleek and stylish. Built quality is good. Very handy in terms of size and grip. Comfortable because of its light weight.  The only con I found is that the touch controls lags a bit. It doesn't work at once sometimes not always. But works for sure and perfectly fine on the second touch. So not such a big issue. Overall the best earbuds for the price.!

The Buds themselves are very light in weight and well built,but the comfort levels in the ear could have been better.Apart from that slightest flaw I didn't find any major downside In this product.To be honest in this price range shouldn't have asked for better !! The case could have been a bit smaller in size The music sounds flawless !
